question_text:
Question 54 
[Geotechnical Engineering : Origin of Soil & Their Properties]
The in-situ percentage of voids of a sand deposit is 50%. The maximum and minimum densities of sand 
determined from the laboratory tests are 
3
1.8 g/cm
  and 
3
1.3 g/cm
 , respectively. Assume the specific
gravity of sand as 2.7. The relative density index of the in-situ sand is __________ (rounded off to 2 
decimal places) 
Ans. 0.12 to 0.14 OR 12 to 14
